name: Python 3
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && xargs apt install -y <packages.txt || echo 'No additional packages to install'; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install -r requirements.txt || echo 'No requirements found'; pip3 install streamlit

postAttachCommand.server: streamlit run streamlit_app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false --logger.level debug
